title: Timing 1.8 – Discover how you spend time on your Mac
content: Timing is the best way to keep track of the time you spend with your Mac. title: Fake 1.9.1 – Browser that simplifies Web automation
content: Fake is a new browser for Mac OS X that makes web automation simple.
